title: For the best location in Bloomington, look no further!
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Covington Apartments', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$1580 - $1640/Month | 1 Bedroom 1 Bath | 767 sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities', '● 9 Foot Ceilings', '● Air Conditioning', '● Floor to Ceiling Windows', '● Garbage Disposal', '● Kitchen Island', '● Microwave', '● Nature and City Views', '● Plank Flooring', '● Smoke Free', '● Storage Space', 'Community Features', '● Bike Storage', '● Business Center', '● Cardio Machines', '● Conference Room', '● Disposal Chutes', '● Fire Pits', '● Free Weights', '● Online Payments', '● Pool', '● Sundeck', '● 24-Hour Fitness Center', '● Barbecue/Grill Area', '● Corporate Suites', '● Fitness Programs/Classes', '● Furnished Units Available', '● Massages Offered', '● Package Deliver to Apartment', '● Pet Washing Station', '● Video Surveillance/Patrol', '● Welcoming Lobby Areas', 'About Community', 'Description:', 'Amazing.', 'Great staff.', 'The best.', 'A great place to call home.', "These words aren't ours-", "they're just some of the incredible reviews that you'll find describing The Covington Apartment Homes in Bloomington, Minnesota.", 'We work hard to make The Covington a great place to live, and we would love to welcome you into our friendly apartment community.', 'Location:', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Thu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Fri - Sat: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Our Management Company:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '69F740396C8A45B']
